data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word وَفِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: To be right, just or fitting, worthy of, justly due to, proper, genuine, real, a fact, true, necessitated, suitable, necessary, incumbent upon, suited to the requirement of justice, become certain, authentic, deserve.
data.sentence: The word حَقٌّ comes from the root ح ق ق and is associated with the meanings: To be right, just or fitting, worthy of, justly due to, proper, genuine, real, a fact, true, necessitated, suitable, necessary, incumbent upon, suited to the requirement of justice, become certain, authentic, deserve.

data.meanings: To be abundant in weath, possess an abundance of property.
data.sentence: The word أَمْوَالِهِمْ comes from the root م و ل and is associated with the meanings: To be abundant in weath, possess an abundance of property.

data.meanings: to ask/interrogate/inquire/question/demand/pray/beg, a thing asked, a question/proposition/problem/petition/request, beggar, that which is demanded or inquired into, asked, questioned, responsible.
data.sentence: The word لِلسَّائِلِ comes from the root س ا ل and is associated with the meanings: to ask/interrogate/inquire/question/demand/pray/beg, a thing asked, a question/proposition/problem/petition/request, beggar, that which is demanded or inquired into, asked, questioned, responsible.

data.meanings: To forbid, prevent, prohibit, make or declare unlawful, deprive, declare a thing sacred.
data.sentence: The word وَالْمَحْرُومِ comes from the root ح ر م and is associated with the meanings: To forbid, prevent, prohibit, make or declare unlawful, deprive, declare a thing sacred.
